The accompanying pilgrimage has ended, please describe the experience Guidelines Pilgrimage Guidelines 1. Image Mobility conditions The image must be taken to the place of the visit and retrieved personally. If this is not possible, they must coordinate with another person from the mission who can do it. 2. Visit Time one (1) to fifteen (15) days 3. Prayer of the Rosary Prior to the beginning of the Holy Rosary, light the candle arranged in the home visited with the flame of beautiful love. Follow the official format of the Rosary of the MDG Mission. 4. Before finishing the Rosary: during the recitation of the Holy Rosary, after the prayer of Consecration to the Virgin Mary and before the final blessing, the pilgrims must guide two moments specials: 4.1 Tell the story of the Pilgrim Image and/or read some excerpts from the messages that Our Lady has given to Carolina Name and that are included in the brochure of the pilgrim mission. 4.2 If possible and depending on the time of the visit that they have available in the place of pilgrimage, those in charge of the mission will invite each person attending to come in front of the Image and on their knees, ask, in the silence of their hearts, for all your intentions. 5. Final Farewell Prayer of consecration to Mary. final blessing 6. Invitation Inform the family that is visited about the social networks of the mission YouTube, Instagram, Facebook: @Carolina Name MDG and official page www.madredeladivinagracia.org Invite them to connect to the Monday rosaries, the dawn rosary of the first Saturday of the month and to the different activities that are scheduled 7. Virtual Pilgrimage The same previous steps apply, taking into account that the MDG Image and the notebook must be previously brought and collected (both personally). 8. How to take care of your Replica - Before a visit, dry clean the Pilgrim image with a cloth and when transporting it, hopefully use an official case or one that is safe for this purpose.
\n\n- For the restoration of the images due to deterioration of time and/or manipulation, the head of the mission in each city must be informed, who will also coordinate with the Pilgrim Virgin Committee in Colombia.
\n\n- If the virgin suffers any breakage or accident, also inform the head of the mission or the Pilgrim Virgin Committee. Please do not repair, sand, paint or make any modifications to the image.
\n\n- If the image was lost, the person who made the visit must inform the head of the mission or the Pilgrim Virgin Committee.
\n\n- It is important to remember that these images of the Mother of Divine Grace of the Rose of Peace are only pilgrims, that is, they are passing through places and therefore are NOT for sale.
\n\n- In case someone is interested in buying the small image, they can invite them to visit @rositadegracia or www.rositadegracia.com
Good Regular Bad
* If youu want to get a container send email to quinteromau@gmail.com Send email to qinteromau@gmail.com Receiver User Owner Mis corazones: Yo os bendigo a vosotros en nombre de Dios el Padre, el Hijo y el Espíritu Santo…
Mi corazón se regocija por vuestra presencia… Habéis rezado el rosario con devoción… Mi hijo Jesús os bendice, impone su mano sobre vuestra cabeza, pasa sanando vuestras pequeñas almas de vuestros dolores…
Yo soy la Inmaculada Concepción y siempre Virgen María, la madre de Jesús y vuestra Madre... Yo soy la Madre de la Divina Gracia, la Madre del Amor hermoso, vuestra Mamá… ¡Os exhorto hijos!... Os llamo… Os invito a llevar una vida de amor a los sacramentos…
Hijos: Si vosotros queréis ser salvos, debéis caminar por el sendero que os ha trazado mi Hijo… Sed buenos niños… Sed obedientes, puros de corazón, dóciles… Mi corazón de madre os acoge… Yo no os dejo solos…. Vosotros id, acudid, acompañad a mi Hijo en el Santísimo Sacramento… ¡Orad!... ¡Orad!... ¡Orad!... Sed oración… Buscad la gracia en las piscinas de la gracia… Dejad que el agua del costado de Cristo os purifique…
Yo os amo y, desde estas tierras tan amadas, yo os bendigo a vosotros hijos de la tierra y os pido, como madre preocupada, volved vuestros ojos a Dios… ¡Ya no es tiempo de dudar!... Os amo y os bendigo… Bendiciones… Bendiciones… Bendiciones…
Id en paz hijitos y llevad la paz a todos mis hijos confundidos y perdidos… En medio de la tempestad, sed fuente de calor, amor y ternura para tantos que viven en tristeza, desolación y soledad… Adiós mis hijos… Bendiciones… Bendiciones…
